title: The Lost Puppy
text: One day, a small puppy got lost in the park. It barked and barked until a little girl named Mia found it and took it home.

title: The Science Fair Surprise
text: Sibongile worked hard on her science fair project. On the day of the fair, she was nervous. But when the judges came by, they were impressed and gave her the first prize!

questions.question: What event was Sibongile preparing for?
